com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.lowlevel.pelionclouddevicemanagement.api

Interface PreSharedKeysApi


  • public interface PreSharedKeysApi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Remove a PSK.
      retrofit2.Call<PreSharedKeyWithoutSecret> getPreSharedKey(java.lang.String endpointName)

      retrofit2.Call<ListOfPreSharedKeysWithoutSecret> listPreSharedKeys(java.lang.Integer limit, java.lang.String after)

    • Method Detail

      • deletePreSharedKey

        @DELETE(value="v2/device-shared-keys/{endpoint_name}")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> deletePreSharedKey(@Path(value="endpoint_name",encoded=true)
                                                                                                          java.lang.String endpointName)
        Remove a PSK. Remove a PSK. **Example:** ``` curl -X DELETE https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v2/device-shared-keys/my-endpoint-0001 \\ -H \"Authorization: Bearer <api_key>\" ```
        Parameters:
        endpointName - The unique endpoint identifier that this PSK applies to. [Reserved characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percent-encoding#Percent-encoding_reserved_characters) must be percent-encoded. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • getPreSharedKey

        @GET(value="v2/device-shared-keys/{endpoint_name}")
retrofit2.Call<PreSharedKeyWithoutSecret> getPreSharedKey(@Path(value="endpoint_name",encoded=true)
                                                                                                               java.lang.String endpointName)
        Get a PSK. Check if a PSK for an endpoint exists or not. The response does not contain the secret itself. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v2/device-shared-keys/my-endpoint-0001 \\ -H \"Authorization: Bearer <api_key>\" ```
        Parameters:
        endpointName - The unique endpoint identifier that this PSK applies to. [Reserved characters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percent-encoding#Percent-encoding_reserved_characters) must be percent-encoded. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<PreSharedKeyWithoutSecret>

      • listPreSharedKeys

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @GET(value="v2/device-shared-keys")
retrofit2.Call<ListOfPreSharedKeysWithoutSecret> listPreSharedKeys(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                                                                                          @Query(value="after")
                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String after)
        List PSKs. Retrieve pre-shared keys (PSKs) with pagination. Default page size of 50 entries. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v2/device-shared-keys \\ -H \"Authorization: Bearer <api_key>\" ```
        Parameters:
        limit - The number of entries per page. (optional)
        after - An offset token for fetching a specific page. Provided by the server. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<ListOfPreSharedKeysWithoutSecret>

      • uploadPreSharedKey

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @POST(value="v2/device-shared-keys")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> uploadPreSharedKey(@Body
                                                                                                                                          PreSharedKey body)
        Upload a PSK to Pelion Device Management. Upload a PSK for an endpoint to allow it to bootstrap. The existing key cannot be overwritten, but needs to be deleted first in the case of re-setting a PSK for an endpoint. **Note**: The PSK APIs are available only to accounts that have this feature enabled. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v2/device-shared-keys \\ -H \"Authorization: Bearer <api_key>\" \\ -H \"content-type: application/json\" \\ -d '{ \"endpoint_name\": \"my-endpoint-0001\", \"secret_hex\": \"4a4a4a4a4a4a4a4a4a4a4a4a4a4a4a4a\" }' ```
        Parameters:
        body - PSK to upload. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>
